forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 22. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 39. Southwest wind 8 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As night drapes its heavy cloak over Boston, the city pulsates with a quiet vibrancy, marked by the soft glow of lights shimmering against the dark canvas of an overcast sky. The chill of the evening ushers in a brisk wind, coaxing those who wander outside to wrap themselves snugly in layers, as a low of twenty-two awaits. Although the air carries a hint of crispness typical of winter nights, there is an admirable clarity to the atmosphere, brushing away any thoughts of fog or discomfort. 

In the dawn light on Sunday, the sun will rise to embrace the day with a promise of mostly sunny skies, inviting residents to shake off the solemnity of the season. Despite brisk winds nudging up to sixteen miles an hour, the high of thirty-nine degrees reveals a day ripe for thoughtful pursuits. It would be wise to don a warm coat—a knit hat perhaps, and sturdy boots—ideal for a stroll through the city’s winding streets or a leisurely stop at a local café for a steamy cup of coffee. This is a perfect time to immerse oneself in a good book at the park or to simply enjoy the whispers of winter living. The air will be invigorating, encouraging both action and reflection as Boston continues to exhibit its undeniable charm.
